Class Night

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Night

public class Night
extends greenfoot.Actor

Black rectangle that will cover the screen when it is night time. Completely transparent when spawned.

Version:
March 19, 2014
Author:
Terrence Hung

          Constructs black screen, with it being completely transparent.
